Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: This game was awesome! No criticism from me - the story\, gameplay\, graphics\, mechanics\, acting\, suspense - everything rocked! It was like playing a series - it even recapped what happened in the previous chapters. I also love how it recorded your reaction via the camera in the scary scenes. Well done to the development team of this game!
